CustomField.inlineHelpText: Classification of the Terrain Type 0 - Sea, coastal exposed to the open sea I - Lakes or area with negligible vegetation II - Area with low vegetation such as grass and isolated obstacles (trees, buildings) with separations of at least 20 obstacle heights III - Area with regular cover of vegetation or buildings or with isolated obstacles with separations of maximum 20 obstacle heights (such as villages, suburban terrain, forest) IV - Area in which at least 15 % of surface is cove
CustomField.label: Terrain Type DEL
